skillTree.localised_description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.

effects.description: Mount: Skeletal Steed

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

skillTree.localised_description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.

effects.description: Mount: Skeleton Chariot

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

skillTree.localised_description: When the souls are released they endeavour not to return without new victims to torment for eternity.

effects.description: Mount: Casket of Souls

skillTree.localised_description: Some knowledge is so dangerous that it is revealed only to those deemed worthy of the responsibility.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5
	(local region)
Magic resistance: 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Only those who display the correct degree of diligence and reverence may learn the secrets of Unlife.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: Under Settra's iron-fisted rule, war-ravaged cities and monuments to the Nehekharan gods were restored; there was plenty and prosperity for all, and there will be again.

effects.description:
Research rate: +5%
	(factionwide)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: By which the very souls of the Undead can be harnessed, so their physical forms can be controlled.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "They stand staring into the sun for eternity, the physical embodiment of the everlasting gods. Terrible ye who looked into their divine forms!"

effects.description:

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +15%

Leadership: +8 for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen, Skeleton Archers and Tomb Guard units

skillTree.localised_description: By which a whirling cloud of sand and dust is conjured to confound the foe's armies and magic-users.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Sandstorm"
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Sandstorm"

skillTree.localised_description: Like their riders, fallen mounts can be brought back to spitting, snorting Unlife, and bound in servitude.

skillTree.localised_description: Nehekhara's scrolls and relics must be guarded if Settra's Golden Age is to be restored.

effects.description:

	Tomb Guard

skillTree.localised_description: Ancient beyond memory, Khatep has denied death's cold embrace for centuries, and will continue to do so.

effects.description: Hero capacity: +1 for Liche Priests

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Liche Priests

skillTree.localised_description: The oldest and wisest of the Liche Priests is the head of the Mortuary Cult's hieratic council.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +20

Hero action success chance: +5% for Liche Priests
	(all characters)

skillTree.localised_description: Imbued with the essence of the God of Death, the Nehekharans' blades strike with supernatural force to harvest souls for Djaf.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Restless Dead"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

Ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: The promise of a glorious afterlife worthy of a courageous warrior keeps embattled troops focused on the grim task at hand.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Carrying the blessing of the goddess Asaph, these arrows seek out the foe with unerring accuracy.
